document_data.name: Bolts of warding
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bolts of warding''''' was a weapon-focused encounter prayer available to [[cleric]]s during the post-[[Spellplague]] era.
document_data.Effects: When ''bolts of warding'' was cast a weapon being wielded by the cleric would temporarily crackle all along its surface with [[divine magic|divine]] lightning. This lightning would arc out from the weapon and strike at any enemy that got up close to any allies that were within {{SI|25|ft|long=yes}} of the caster.
document_data.Components: Casting this spell required the cleric to be wielding a weapon.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1420}}, a party of four [[Daggerdale]]smen [[adventurer]]s were [[teleport|summoned]] to the [[mines of Tethyamar]] by the [[Banite]] priestess [[Lorin-Aria]] to kill the [[Zhent]] wizard [[Rezlus]] and put an end to his plans to conquer Daggerdale and the greater [[Dalelands]] region. Among this party of adventurers was a [[dwarf]] [[cleric]] who knew the prayer ''bolts of warding''.
